title: Because I know you more than anyone else

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Sorry for the wait! I got some popcorn!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, where are the others?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
...Over there. ...Opera O's doing... what you expect.
I wouldn't go over there if I were you.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
HAAHAHAHA! Do not lament the end of the parade!
Let the Overlord of Century's End sing an aria to soothe your woes!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Oh, okay. Haha.
Oh, my phone... Hello? Doto-chan?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(Wahhh~ Top Road-san! Sniff... sniff...
I got lost in the crowd... Wh-where am I...?)

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
You'll be okay. Just hang tight for a little bit.
...I'm going to go get Doto-chan and Opera O-chan!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Both of them? ...I can go get one of them――

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: It's fine! We wouldn't want someone to get lost again, so feel free to wait here. It'd be a great help if you held onto the popcorn!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: (Ohh... I was worried about what would happen if they got separated, but... Now that Top Road-san is back, all those worries are gone!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(Heheheheh, now they're getting together for popcorn time.
I can't believe I get to see this IRL...
Thanks for the fooooood~~!)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Mm... This döner kebab flavor has quite the unique taste!
What flavor is yours, Top Road-san?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Time for me to have some too... Huh? It's not opening?
Nnnnnnngh!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: It's o-whwaaahh!? ――Ahh!! The popcorn!!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Whoa there... You sure spilled a lot.
I'll go give the cleaners a heads up!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ――Huh? Well, hey there, Digital-chan!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
HOUGH!!
...Aha... ahaha... W-w-what a co-co-coinkydink, huh!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: It sure is. So you're here with your friends too, Digital-chan?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Er, no, I'm here alone...

text_block_list.name: Digital and Topro
text_block_list.text:
S-sorry, I'll leave now!
Alone? Well, how about you come with us?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: See, well... We have a group of four right now, so why not tag along? Plus, it'll be easier to split up food and take pictures with five of us!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: No, no, I'm not worthy! Butting my way into your hangout... That's an INSTABAN! In Umamusume-chan fan law, it's a crime of the GREATEST degree!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
...Wait, what? Hahaha, don't be silly!
If it's not too much, please, feel free to join us, Digital-chan!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hey! Everyone! It seems we can rent out outfits here!
Let us don the oufits of Fairyland, and take plenty of photographs!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
O- outfits... Limited alts...! ...Wait, no!
I can't get in their way any more!!
...But the FOMO's so strong...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
........Um~.... If, purely hypothetically...
...If thou requirest a camerawoman, then, perchance... I could...!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Of course you can come have fun with us!
But you don't have to worry about being the camerawoman, okay?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm... So many outfits to choose from. How vexing.
I'd be so beautiful in all of them, there's no way to choose!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Hang on, how come none of you have changed?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Whoa... Ayabe-san, you're so pretty! This is an Ice Kingdom costume, right?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: It is... It was the simplest thing they had.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, so you're taking the role of the Ice King.
Then perhaps I'll put on a black outfit to contrast it.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Uh, um! ...C-can I...
Can I also wear black to match you?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
But of course. You are free to take your pick, Doto.
――What costume are you thinking of, Top Road-san?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: I'll just take the pictures!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
No, no, I'll handle camera duty!
This is a picture of your generation-mates, we can't leave you out!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
I've already taken plenty of pictures with everyone.
But we haven't taken a single one of you.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: No, no! I tagged along specifically to take pictures! I'm happy enough just knowing you were thinking of me! No, actually, I'm already over the moon!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Then... how about we both change?
We can take turns on the camera. 'Kay?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ...Y- yesssss...!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Camera duty... 
I don't believe that answers my question.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: "The Overlord of Century's End", T.M. Opera O. She is as the sun. A light of hope that shines upon the people. However―― Hope exists not only in the light.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hope also lies in the shadows of avarice. Unleash your heart's desires! Do not hold back. Let me give you a taste of sweetest sin.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
And fall―― Fall to my feet.
I await you in the abyss. Together with my faithful Dotoberus.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Dotoberus...! Y-you even gave me a name!?
Ehehe~! I'm so glad to be a doggy~.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
...'Doggy'? I think it's supposed to be Cerberus...
Didn't you pick the costume yourself?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Um, well, I wanted to be a demon like Opera O-san, but...
I was so nervous pointing out what I wanted, I ended up pointing at the doggy costume~

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
ASKLDLFK-DEMON! The Overlord's fallen to the darkness... NICE!!
The black-and-white contrast with Ayabe-san's costume is just so, so, peak!!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ――You there, innocent girl. Don't you want... a taste of sin?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Wow, nice tempting! I'm going to take a picture of this!
Doto-chan, Ayabe-san, can you get in frame, too?
Okay, now hold that pose!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
――Whoa, it's already dark out!
Time really did fly. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Oh, I'll send the pictures to the group LANE once we get back!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Mmhm. Thank you.
We... we ended up putting you on camera duty, didn't we...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, Digital-chan took a bunch of pictures too.
We made a lot of fun faces in them, so be sure to take a look through, okay?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...I will.
